description:
Sweet dried cherries and crushed pistachios blended with creamy nut butter, hearty oats and crunchy rice crisps. Having solved the energy chew, Skratch Labs set their sights on creating an energy bar that tastes like a coffee shop cookie but delivers the fuel your body needs.

  • Plant-based ingredients allow for fast absorption and easy digestion
  • 100% non-GMO ingredients
  • 50% less sugar than the average energy bar
  • Ingredients: nut butter blend (cashew butter, almond butter), oats, tapioca syrup solids, coconut nectar, pistachios, tapioca syrup, sunflower seeds, vegetable glycerine, brown rice crisps, quinoa crisps, oat flour, dried cherries, sorghum flakes (ancient grain), sunflower lecithin, sea salt
  • Allergens: contains tree nuts (almonds, cashews)
name: Skratch Labs Energy Bar Cherries and Pistachios
